Package cryptoTrader.utils

Class TradeActivity

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.utils.TradeActivity
public class TradeActivity
extends java.lang.Object
Date: April 4, 2022
Author:
luke gabert This class creates a TradeActivity object which holds details of an individual trade

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TradeActivity​(TradingBroker tradingBroker, java.lang.String strategy)
    Constructor which only creates a TradeActivity object for a failed trade
    TradeActivity​(TradingBroker tradingBroker, java.lang.String action, java.lang.String quantity, CryptoCoin coin, java.lang.String strategy)
    Public constructor which creates a TradeActivity object

  • Constructor Details

    • TradeActivity

      public TradeActivity​(TradingBroker tradingBroker, java.lang.String action, java.lang.String quantity, CryptoCoin coin, java.lang.String strategy)
      Public constructor which creates a TradeActivity object
      Parameters:
      tradingBroker - : The trading broker performing the trade
      action - : This can be buy, sell, or failed trade, describing the action of the trade
      quantity - : this is the amount of Cryptocoins being bought
      coin - : This is the coin being bought or sold
      strategy - : The trading strategy associated with this trade

    • TradeActivity

      public TradeActivity​(TradingBroker tradingBroker, java.lang.String strategy)
      Constructor which only creates a TradeActivity object for a failed trade
      Parameters:
      tradingBroker - : the broker who attempted the trade
      strategy - : the strategy that the broker attempted to use
